titleStmt.title: A brefe chronycle concernynge the examinacyon and death of the blessed martyr of Christ syr Iohan Oldecastell the lorde Cobham, collected togyther by Iohan Bale ...
titleStmt.author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.

notesStmt.note: Printing often attributed to Hans Luft.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
